tutorialIntro.title: Introduction
tutorialIntro.abstract: One of the most impressive (yet deceptively simple) meals to prepare is the peanut butter and jelly sandwich (PB&J).Preparing this meal, however, can be a daunting undertaking. With proper planning, preparation, equipment, and a steady hand, you can amaze (and feed) your children, friends, and family.

tutorialIntroBody.longDesc:
Serving a PB&J is so much more than simply smearing some peanut butter and jelly on two slices of bread. The critical selection of appetizers, desserts, and the appropriate beverage, paired with proper preparation and presentation techniques can make or break your feast.
Before you get started, read the following sections to make sure you fully understand the scope, goals, and requirements for this tutorial.
tutorialIntroBody.learningObjectives:
Learning objectivesBy completing this tutorial you will learn the following skills:
How to plan the menu for your PB&J meal
How to gather appropriate supplies and ingredients
How to prepare the food for your PB&J meal
How to properly serve the PB&J meal
tutorialIntroBody.timeRequired: Time requiredThis tutorial should take approximately 30 minutes to finish. If you explore other concepts related to this tutorial, it could take longer to complete.
tutorialIntroBody.systemRequirements:
Required materialsTo complete this tutorial, your kitchen must have the following minimum requirements:
Table or other appropriate eating surface
Oven
Serving and preparation utensils: plates, butter knives, glasses, cookie sheet, bowl
